favourite.article: Jesus, Come quickly, We’re waiting for You; We’re the virgins to You, So single and true; Forever and ever Your counterpart true. Lord we want to be true to You!

Oh Lord Jesus I love You!!! My treasure You are!!! This hymn is lovely to sing to The Lord and warms my heart so much toward Him. It feels with each stanza I open my whole being to Him more. By the end my spirit is agreeing with the corporate prayer of "Jesus come quickly, we're waiting for You". Oh may I be one of the wise virgins preparing for the return of our beloved Bridegroom!
Jesus, I love You. My treesure You are. Lord, You're my treasure and I LOVE YOU!
